title: Food Security and Livelihoods Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TechnoServe (Harare)
Interview Descriptions: Average experience. I was asked a whole set of questions that were not difficult to answer. However i feel that the interviewing panel was a bit overcrowded. Some of the panel asked irrelevant questions in relation to the job description.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself and working history, highlighting achievements.

title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: Comfortable, conversation like and easy to deal with. Mostly background is understood and role and organization is explained. Patient and easy- going conversation that helps you bring out your best . They are trying to understand your motivation to get in and how does it make sense for them to take you on.
Interview Questions: What is your educational background What is your professional background What do you know about technoserve Why do you want to join Will you be comfortable with the role

title: Data Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: First, I had a screening call with a recruiter covering typical questions. I moved on to the first round, which was by video interview with 3 people. The questions covered hypothetical scenarios, background in M&E and project planning, career goals, and details about the role. Minimal questions on technical skills or projects - focused more on international development impact and monitoring context.
Interview Questions: Which of the following do you consider your strength: project planning,  project implementation, or project monitoring?

title: HR Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TechnoServe in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: I saw the job being posted, and I applied. Then I was shortlisted for the written and online aptitude tests and interviewed by two panelists. But they did not meet salary expectations. Hence declined the offer
Interview Questions: From your perspective, having managed HR both in NGO and private sector spheres, what are the biggest challenges/needs/gaps in Talent Management that most employers face? What initiatives have you developed to respond to the challenges

title: Summer Intern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: First they asked about myself then they asked about my interests and a little about my education. For sometime they asked about my Graduation subject and then they asked my current experience and also about my master's subject. Then they gave a situation based question and asked what would i do
Interview Questions: They asked about current experience and also a situational question

title: Communications Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at TechnoServe in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: The process was smooth overall, with an initial phone call with the recruiter, then a writing test and a virtual panel interview. That said, the panel interview was rather intimidating and awkward given the virtual setting.
Interview Questions: Questions varied between experience with SEO and online content management to interests and connections to global issues.

title: Regional Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at TechnoServe (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Tuve cuatro entrevistas, la primera fue para tener una idea sobre mi nivel de ingles y mi experiencia, ka segunda fue con la directora de finanzas internacional y fue para saber mi experiencia técnica en todos los temas financieros, tuve dos  entrevistas en persona en Washington DC, con 3l CFO y otra con la Directora de Personal.  La organización tiene una cultura muy amigable, colaborativo,  esta en continuo desarrollo de los sistemas y el uso de NAV en todas sus capacidades, pero en busca de su estructura optima la cual esta por definir.
Interview Questions: Cuantos paises has supervisado como analista financiero

title: Strategic Initiatives Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TechnoServe in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions:
The internship interview process was poorly organized. Instead of using TechnoServe's HR department, the team had a team member organize the process--which led to non-responses to emails, emails on the weekend, etc. 

The internship (which pays minimum wage) consisted of  2 case questions--and very little time was spent on behavioral questions, such as "Why do you want this position?". Instead, for an internship which was marketed as an "entry point for international development" and the main job tasks were to be research, a quantitative and qualitative case were conducted. This felt like overkill, especially given the low pay and job description. (All of this was for an explicitly first round interview). 

After the interview, they ghosted me. My advice to TechnoServe is that all interview processes need to be coordinated through HR so that all interview processes are conducted in professional manners.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have figuring things out on your own?

title: Volunteer Consultant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone interview with the hiring manager. Casual chat about the role followed by specific questions about my work ex. Also had a chat with the recruiting coordinator for volunteers about the process
Interview Questions: Walk me through your work ex.

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions:
Interview was to happen at 11.  They kept as waiting as they didn't seem like they were expecting the candidates. 
Anyway after one hour, they print out the papers and it seems they pulled out questions from a CPA exam.
Overall, they didn't seem to know what they wanted
Interview Questions: It was a written exam

title: Strategy Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: Initial 30-minute screen by HR followed by interview by a 1-hr interview with someone working at the same level.  Was not interviewed by the actual supervisor for the role.  Presumably this would have happened in a later round.
Interview Questions: Basic case study relevant to their work

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TechnoServe (San Francisco, CA) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions:
One casual Interview with the Hiring Manager to discuss my background and prior experience, the role, the goals for the project and my expectations. 

I ended up working on a pretty high impact project
Interview Questions:
Do you have experience with x technology?
Are you comfortable with learning x technology?

title: PSE Officer and Alliance Builder Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: The process moved quickly and was not clearly defined.  The screening interview was fairly easy, the second interview involved technical questions and the third included questions that were more specific.
Interview Questions: What would you do in a situation where a stakeholder or partner requested an unfair advantage?

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TechnoServe (Lagos)
Interview Descriptions: 3 levels. Basic one with HR person, Second with Senior and Regional Managers, 3rd with Country Director. Process took 2 months and was quite organized in the beginning but later turned unprofessional. Told the salary expectation at the 1st contact. Wasted my time by making me go through all 3 levels of interview only to be offered a ridiculously small salary for the role
Interview Questions: 3 innovations in Agriculture, Discuss some Agricultural Value Chains and Issues surrounding them

title: Talent Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TechnoServe
Interview Descriptions: Rushed, a bit formulaic. The recruiter was more focused on providing background around position without enough knowledge to provide a background on position specifics such as; direct reports, whether it was a new or existing position and scope of responsibilities.
Interview Questions:
Why Technoserve?
What do you know about us?

title: Program Management Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at TechnoServe in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was a very straightforward interview process. We had 1 Case study, 1 Excel round, 1 writing skill round and then 2 rounds of Personal Interview.  The personal interviews can be directed based on your strengths but it strong Excel skills is a must to crack this firm.
Interview Questions: Main reforms that are needed in the agriculture sector

title: Research Associate Interview

Interview Descriptions: Inefficient and incompetent Interviewers. Too many rounds. They could accomplish Interview goals in the first round. But took multiple rounds to basically tell me I wasn't fit for the position
Interview Questions: How much compensation I expect

title: Business Analyst Interview

Two stages of interviews

title: Senior Associate Interview

title: Sr Manager Interview

title: Financial Accountant Interview

Interview Descriptions: The interview is usually easy comprising of written and oral test, you only could need to prepare the usual way you could prepare for an interview. There are 6 questions for the written test and then a followup 1:1 interview with a panel of 2-4,5 persons.
Interview Questions: How you minimized errors as an Accountant?

title: Business Advisor Interview

Interview Descriptions: CV screening , experience scanning, achievements and results, educational background access, oral face to face discussions, personal confidence and computer skills of the candidates addressed. Some time presentation also programmed
Interview Questions: Why business plan important for an organization?

title: Monitoring and Evaluation Interview

title: Business Development Interview

title: Volunteer Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at TechnoServe (Mumbai)
Interview Descriptions: Reached out to the India team through mutual friends. It was really networking based. I was directly interviewed by the India managers and then referred to the US for a final sanity-check.
Interview Questions: Nothing too difficult. They were just interested in learning more about my background.

title: Program Manager, Nigeria - Propcom Maikarfi (DfID Funded Programmer) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TechnoServe (Abuja, Federal Capital Territory)
Interview Descriptions:
Applied by sending my CV to a program director - advert was found online through a job board. 

I was then contacted by a program director who interviewed me a week later, then a written test testing market sector analysis and agribusiness sector knowledge, this was followed by another interview by a Business Development Manager - West Africa and the next interview by the Regional Director - Africa.

This was then followed by salary & reference checking from both two previous employers and my current employer. Reference checks were fine. At this point, I was then made to interview with the implementing partner for the project which was GRM International purportedly the final interview.
Interview Questions: Why I would want to consider moving to the non-profit sector ? Why leaving my current start up business? An example of a market sector analysis I carried out and was I the one that introduced the business to my company?

title: Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at TechnoServe (Lima, Lima Region) in Sept 2011
Interview Descriptions: It was a very normal interview with standard questions. The people where very friendly and the process was very clear. First I talked to the project manager who asked the typical interview questions. Finally I talked with the big boss who asked technical questions and why was I interested on working for this organization.
Interview Questions:
1. Tell me about yourself?

2. What are your biggest strengths?

3. Why did you leave your last job?

4. What are your career goals?

5. Why do you want to work here?

6. What is your greatest weakness?

7. What do co-workers say about you?

8. Are you applying for other jobs?

9. What do you know about our organization?

10. What kind of salary are you looking for?

title: Senior Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TechnoServe (Addis Ababa) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process is so long you will take written examination first after that they will call for interview unfortunately I was interviewed two times. After selection they notify their offer and you will discuss on that
Interview Questions: As a senior accountant what would we expect from you?
